features: Kids Will Love This Montessori Toy: Toddlers 12-15-18 months can play latches, Velcro, switch, gears, key lock, zipper, button or other functions of daily supplies with our busy board. They will explore fun, sensory, challenging & colorful activities, and exercise to identify the role of different products. We encouraging kids use activity board to cultivate cognitive, attention and learning ability.

Sensory Board Helps Toddler to Explore the World: The baby busy board develop fine motor skills, dressing skills, dexterity and brain development. The elements on the wooden learning toys helps the toddler trains finger grip, turning movements and learns how to control their hands. Every way of playing it is related to life, promotes play and learn excitement, allowing babies to learn the most common things in life. Perfect for ages 1 2 3 years old boys and girls.

Safely Improve Babies’ Basic Life Skill: Our motor skills toys for toddlers are made of smooth natural wooden materials, with smooth edge, no burr. All parts of metal hinge are not easy to rust, and the pieces are not detachable so the little cute hand cannot loose them. Activities are challenging and educational for your little child, helps improving their hands on ability at the same time. Pay attention to children's feelings and safety, also a durable autistic toy.

Learning Toy Suitable for Travel: Our toddler quiet board is a great car or plane activities toy while travel! The lightweight and compact design helps away from electronic screens and easy for kids to carry or use on the airplane, on vacation, and while camping. There is more interaction between you and your kid and less frustration when journey ends. More connected to the real world and ready for their day to start.

Perfect Gifts for Your Little Boys and Girls: Let’s enjoy the time with your family by using our Montessori busy board that full of challenges and can keep your kid interested. A great gift choice for birthdays, Christmas, holidays, family gatherings, Children's Day, carnival prize and contest presents to your preschoolers. Ideal board for developing creative and critical thinking through playing, also enhancing children's dignity and confidence by solving problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safely Improve Babies’ Basic Life Skill Our motor skills toys for toddlers 6 to 12 months are made of smooth natural wooden materials, with smooth edges, and no burr. All parts of the metal hinge are not easy to rust, and the pieces are not detachable so the little cute hand cannot lose them. Learning Toy Suitable for Travel Our toddler quiet board is a great car or plane activities toy while traveling! The lightweight and compact design help away from electronic screens and is easy for kids to carry or use on an airplane, on vacation, and while camping. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great busy board!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my grand daughter and she LOVES it. This toy keeps her busy and interested. I like the zipper and shoe strings.. an excellent teaching tool because it makes it fun with no pressure ( like zipping a jacket or tying shoes) she's 17 months so locking and unlocking are a wonder and what child doesn't love hearing Velcro rip.. I would recommend this toy 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A picture of it in the sunlight and one with my 7 month daughter playing with it, she enjoys it! Of course she will figure it out more as she grows but for now it helps us both have more interactive play time together :)I was looking on Etsy for same exact boards…. 100+$$!!! 🥴So this also is amazing on price point and good quality!!! Super fast shipping, I received it the next day. I loved it so much I bought one for my 1 yr old cousin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Great toy for toddlers. Very durable and well made. Great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice except for the buckle
reviews.reviewText: Good quality for the price! I was worried about the toggle falling out due to other reviews, but I don't think it will after messing with it myself. However, my son is obsessed with buckles, one of the reasons I purchased this one, and the straps are just long enough to clasp the buckle, no extra wiggle room for little hands that are just figuring out how to do it. Everything else is great, but the buckle may be a deal breaker for us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our 1 year old. He likes it and it keeps his attention. When he figured out how to manipulate his first one, he was laughing every time. Even our 3, 5, and 8 year olds mess around with it. It was a great Christmas gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old daughter wanted this toy for Christmas I know it is for toddlers but she uses it for funs. Good sturdy and packaged nicely when opened up. I recommend to get this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - pieces come loose (possible choking hazard)
reviews.reviewText: The wood and objects are a good quality, and have a fun, simple but diverse group of things to keep your baby entertained.This product is recommended for 12 months +, I got it for my 12 month old. After only playing with it 3-4 times, I found her with the little red gear shift toggle in her mouth. It comes out of the zig zag wood pattern quite easily. Shouldn’t leave this toy unsupervised with your little one, I’m waiting to see if any other pieces come loose. But for the cheap price I guess it’s not bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and fun
reviews.reviewText: Our grandbaby will learn all the things playing with this! Very nice quality!
